title: @align_partial_oblique
description: A script to align a full coverage T1 weighted non-oblique dataset to match a partial coverage T1 weighted non-oblique dataset. Alignment is done with a rotation and shift (6 parameters) transform only.

input.title: Input dataset
input.description: Partial coverage T1 weighted non-oblique dataset.

suffix.title: Suffix
suffix.description: Output dataset name is formed by adding SUF to the prefix of the base dataset. The default suffix is _alnd_PartialCoverageObliqueT1

clean.title: Clean temporary files flag
clean.description: Clean all temp files, likely left from -keep_tmp option then exit.

dxyz.title: Cubic voxel size
dxyz.description: Cubic voxel size of output dataset in TLRC space Default MM is 1.

dx.title: Voxel size in x direction
dx.description: Size of voxel in the x direction (Right-Left). Default is 1mm.

dy.title: Voxel size in y direction
dy.description: Size of voxel in the y direction (Anterior-Posterior). Default is 1mm.

dz.title: Voxel size in z direction
dz.description: Size of voxel in the z direction (Inferior-Superior). Default is 1mm.
